location.name: Location
location.description: Returns the location of the user's internet provider

morning.name: Morning
morning.description: Returns true when the current local time is between 12am and 6am

afternoon.name: Afternoon
afternoon.description: Returns true when the input time is between 12pm and 6pm

evening.name: Evening
evening.description: Returns true when the input time is between 6pm and 12am

quit if false.name: Quit if false
quit if false.description: Triggers an exit of the main script if the prior service in the flow returns sys.exit(1)

not.name: Not
not.description: Changes the sys.exit() error code from 0 to 1 or vice versa

sunrise.name: Sunrise
sunrise.description: Returns the time for sunrise based on a given latitude and longitude

sunset.name: Sunset
sunset.description: Returns the time for sunset based on a given latitude and longitude

append to file.name: Append to file
append to file.description: saves files in the output file parsed in

wait.name: Wait
wait.description: wait will only return true after a set amount of time has passed since its last call
